text: agar tum us rasool kee madad na karoge to (kuchh paravaah nahin khuda madadagaar hai) usane to apane rasool kee us vakt madad kee jab usakee kuphfaar (makka) ne (ghar se) nikal baahar kiya us vakt sirph (do aadamee the) doosare rasool the jab vah dono gaar (saur) mein the jab apane saathee ko (usakee giriya va zaaree (rone) par) samajha rahe the ki ghabarao nahin khuda yaqeenan hamaare saath hai to khuda ne un par apanee (taraph se) tasakeen naazil pharamaee aur (farishton ke) aise lashkar se unakee madad kee jinako tum logon ne dekha tak nahin aur khuda ne kaaphiron kee baat neechee kar dikhaee aur khuda hee ka bol baala hai aur khuda to gaalib hikamat vaala hai
